code: export var animeListRequested=function animeListRequested(){return{type:'FETCH_ANIME_LIST_REQUEST'};};export var animeListLoaded=function animeListLoaded(ongoings){return{type:'FETCH_ANIME_LIST_SUCCESS',payload:ongoings};};export var animeRequested=function animeRequested(){return{type:'FETCH_ANIME_REQUEST'};};export var animeLoaded=function animeLoaded(anime){return{type:'FETCH_ANIME_SUCCESS',payload:anime};};export var animeSearchListRequested=function animeSearchListRequested(){return{type:'FETCH_ANIME_SEARCH_LIST_REQUEST'};};export var animeSearchListLoaded=function animeSearchListLoaded(animes){return{type:'FETCH_ANIME_SEARCH_LIST_SUCCESS',payload:animes};};export var animeSearchListClear=function animeSearchListClear(){return{type:'CLEAR_ANIME_SEARCH_LIST'};};export var animeListAnimesRequested=function animeListAnimesRequested(){return{type:'UPLOAD_ANIMES_TO_ANIME_LIST_REQUEST'};};export var animeListAnimesLoaded=function animeListAnimesLoaded(animes){return{type:'UPLOAD_ANIMES_TO_ANIME_LIST_SUCCESS',payload:animes};};export var makeListVisible=function makeListVisible(){return{type:'MAKE_LIST_VISIBLE'};};export var makeListInvisible=function makeListInvisible(){console.log("invisible");return{type:'MAKE_LIST_INVISIBLE'};};export var typeAnimeSearch=function typeAnimeSearch(search){return{type:'TYPE_ANIME_SEARCH',payload:search};};export var removeFromMyList=function removeFromMyList(anime){return{type:'REMOVE_FROM_MY_LIST',payload:anime};};export var addToMyList=function addToMyList(anime){return{type:'ADD_TO_MY_LIST',payload:anime};};
